channel.title: Datavize on Len Kiefer
channel.description: Recent content in Datavize on Len Kiefer

item.title: Visual meditations on house prices
item.description: Introduction This is a multi-part blog series on visual meditations on house prices. You can find the links at: Part 1: data wrangling Part 2: sparklines and dots (animated) Part 3: bubbles and bounce Part 4: graph gallery Part 5: distributions Part 6: state recovery Part 7: don’t cross the streams and maybe more as I think of them. I’ll add them all here.
